mapper.select: select station_code,position_code,line_code from inspection_str_sta_rel where inspection_str_code = #{planCode}

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( e.depart_name ) FROM inspection_str_org_rel inor LEFT JOIN sys_depart e ON inor.org_code = e.org_code WHERE inor.inspection_str_code = #{code}
AND inor.del_flag = 0

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT css.system_name ) FROM inspection_str_rel insr LEFT JOIN inspection_code ic ON ic.`code` = insr.inspection_sta_code LEFT JOIN cs_subsystem css ON ic.subsystem_code = css.system_code WHERE insr.inspection_str_code = #{code}
AND ic.del_flag = 0 AND css.del_flag = 0

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT csm.major_name ) FROM inspection_str_rel insr LEFT JOIN inspection_code ic ON ic.`code` = insr.inspection_sta_code LEFT JOIN cs_major csm ON ic.major_code = csm.major_code WHERE insr.inspection_str_code = #{code}
AND ic.del_flag = 0 AND csm.del_flag = 0
